description:
Additional customization skin usable for select characters.

Prism Heart Costume Set includes:
- Prism Heart Cap
- Prism Heart Dress

*Costumes and decorations can be equipped on the SKIN tab of the CUSTOMIZE screen, which will be available after clearing Story > Chapter 1 > Quest 1.
name: SWORD ART ONLINE Fractured Daydream - Prism Heart Costume Set
